H0.text: In the nursery rhyme ‘As I Was Going To St Ives’ I met a man with how many wives. 3

H1.text: In the nursery rhyme ‘As I Was Going To St Ives’ I met a man with how many wives. 5

H2.text: In the nursery rhyme ‘As I Was Going To St Ives’ I met a man with how many wives. 9

H3.text: In the nursery rhyme ‘As I Was Going To St Ives’ I met a man with how many wives. 7

A4.text: The most common modern version of the rhyme mentions a man with seven wives.

A5.text: A version from Harley MS 7316 (circa 1730) mentions a man with nine wives.
